attributes.action: Fight the cuts for those on incapacity benefits
attributes.additional_details: Are you claiming incapacity benefits? Can you not work? The government plans to remove thousand of people off these benefits fight this if you cannot work because of illness or disability!  Yes there are those who claim fraudulently and should be taken off but what about the honest people like myself who would love to work? If your one of these people like this page and spread the word.
